statements: SELECT * FROM Leadership_Succession_Planning;
SELECT employee_name, current_position FROM Leadership_Succession_Planning;
SELECT employee_name, years_in_current_position FROM Leadership_Succession_Planning WHERE years_in_current_position > 5;
SELECT employee_name, current_position FROM Leadership_Succession_Planning ORDER BY current_position DESC;
SELECT employee_name, current_position, potential_successor FROM Leadership_Succession_Planning WHERE potential_successor IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Leadership_Succession_Planning WHERE years_in_current_position > 5 ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT employee_name, current_position FROM Leadership_Succession_Planning WHERE potential_successor IS NULL;
SELECT COUNT(employee_id) AS total_employees, AVG(years_in_current_position) AS avg_years FROM Leadership_Succession_Planning;
SELECT * FROM Leadership_Succession_Planning ORDER BY years_in_current_position ASC, employee_name DESC;

SELECT employee_name, current_position, years_in_current_position FROM Leadership_Succession_Planning WHERE years_in_current_position > 2 AND years_in_current_position < 7 ORDER BY years_in_current_position DESC, employee_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Leadership_Succession_Planning
SELECT employee_name, role FROM Leadership_Succession_Planning ORDER BY employee_id
SELECT * FROM Successor_Eligibility WHERE age > 30
SELECT employee_name, role FROM Leadership_Succession_Planning WHERE end_date IS NULL

SELECT employee_name, years_experience, readiness_score FROM Leadership_Succession_Planning JOIN Successor_Eligibility ON Leadership_Succession_Planning.successor_id = Successor_Eligibility.successor_id
SELECT * FROM Leadership_Succession_Planning WHERE role = 'Manager' ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT employee_name, role, start_date, end_date FROM Leadership_Succession_Planning WHERE successor_id IS NULL;
SELECT employee_name, years_experience, readiness_score FROM Leadership_Succession_Planning AS LSP JOIN Successor_Eligibility AS SE ON LSP.successor_id = SE.successor_id WHERE SE.age > 30;
SELECT employee_name, role, start_date, end_date FROM Leadership_Succession_Planning WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Leadership_Succession_Planning WHERE role IN ('Manager', 'Director') AND successor_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY role DESC, employee_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM SuccessionPlan;
SELECT employee_name, current_role FROM SuccessionPlan WHERE current_role = 'Manager';
SELECT successor_name, age, experience_years FROM SuccessorProfile ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM SuccessionHistory WHERE transition_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_name, previous_role, new_role FROM SuccessionHistory ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM SuccessionPlan ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT successor_name, age, experience_years FROM SuccessorProfile WHERE age > 30 AND experience_years > 5;
SELECT * FROM SuccessionHistory WHERE transition_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY transition_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT employee_name, current_role, next_role FROM SuccessionPlan WHERE current_role != next_role;
SELECT employee_name, previous_role, new_role, transition_date FROM SuccessionHistory WHERE previous_role LIKE '%Manager%' OR new_role LIKE '%Director%' ORDER BY transition_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM LeadershipPosition;
SELECT id, position_title FROM LeadershipPosition WHERE position_title = 'CEO';
SELECT * FROM SuccessionPlan ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT current_holder, next_in_line FROM LeadershipPosition WHERE id = 'f6808487-f4cd-43e8-89c7-7ac14b4b2cbd';
SELECT name, start_date FROM Employee WHERE position_id = '8e8b3da4-41b6-455b-b647-6b4e5d0f9ada';
SELECT * FROM LeadershipPosition ORDER BY position_title DESC, id ASC;
SELECT position_title, current_holder FROM LeadershipPosition WHERE current_holder = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM Employee INNER JOIN LeadershipPosition ON Employee.position_id = LeadershipPosition.id WHERE Employee.start_date > '2021-01-01';

SELECT Employee.name, LeadershipPosition.position_title, Permission.permission_level FROM Employee JOIN LeadershipPosition ON Employee.position_id = LeadershipPosition.id JOIN Permission ON Employee.id = Permission.employee_id WHERE Permission.permission_level >= 3;

SELECT Employee.name, SuccessionPlan.start_date, SuccessionPlan.end_date, LeadershipPosition.position_title FROM SuccessionPlan JOIN Employee ON SuccessionPlan.successor_id = Employee.id JOIN LeadershipPosition ON SuccessionPlan.position_id = LeadershipPosition.id WHERE SuccessionPlan.start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Leadership_Team;
SELECT name, position, start_date FROM Successors WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM Training_Programs WHERE program_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT rating, comments FROM Performance_Reviews WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT MAX(end_date) AS latest_end_date FROM Successors;
SELECT * FROM Leadership_Team WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, position FROM Leadership_Team WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Successors JOIN Leadership_Team ON Successors.team_id = Leadership_Team.id;
SELECT name, position, start_date FROM Leadership_Team WHERE end_date > '2022-12-31' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Succession_Plans WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
